description:
Shirou Kamui is a powerful esper whose destiny is to decide whether the world should be destroyed so it may be reborn without humanity or to save the world so humanity can continue to live in its current state. In his childhood, he lived across the street from Togakushi Shrine, and became friends with Fuuma and Kotori. At the age of nine he left Tokyo with his mother, and his return to Tokyo seven years later begins the events of the story.
Kamui also appears in Tsubasa Chronicle: Tokyo Revelations, as one of the vampire twins Seishirou is after. He leads the fighters of the City Hall faction (alternate versions of the Dragons of Earth) in a battle to protect their water source.
name: Shirou Kamui
